kv18.1:5.4: Nanu atthi buddhavutthāni cetiyāni ārāmavihāragāmanigamanagarāni raṭṭhāni janapadānīti?
kv18.1:5.6: Hañci atthi buddhavutthāni cetiyāni ārāmavihāragāmanigamanagarāni raṭṭhāni janapadāni, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv18.1:6.4: Nanu bhagavā lumbiniyā jāto, bodhiyā mūle abhisambuddho, bārāṇasiyaṃ bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, cāpāle cetiye āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho, kusinārāyaṃ bhagavā parinibbutoti?
kv18.1:6.8: kusinārāyaṃ bhagavā parinibbuto, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv18.1:7.5: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti;
kv18.1:7.6: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ viharāmi ajapālanigrodhe paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti;
kv18.1:7.7: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ rājagahe viharāmi veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe”ti;
kv18.1:7.8: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti;
kv18.1:7.9: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ vesāliyaṃ viharāmi mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyan”ti.
kv18.1:7.12: Tena hi buddho bhagavā manussaloke aṭṭhāsīti.
kv18.1:8.3: Nanu bhagavā loke jāto, loke saṃvaḍḍho, lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenāti?
kv18.1:8.5: Hañci bhagavā loke jāto, loke saṃvaḍḍho, lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokena, no ca vata re vattabbe—
